sections.description: We use the gfx component is used for colorful "ascii art". Each line is 110 characters long. The line contents are aligned left when all of the characters fit on the screen. The line contents are centered on smaller screens where some of the characters won't fit on the screen. In the app we use javascript to snap the centering to the monospace character grid. Perhaps it is possible to make the snapping work with pure CSS some day. The first line in the example markup is an attempt to visualize safe areas for different breakpoints. The component supports 20 colors all thought the two blacks (0 and a) are perhaps not so useful since we would typically have a dark background.

sections.description: The log component is used for vertical phrasing. It supports clearing the screen and adds empty lines to make reading the message flow easier. Clearing doesn't behave correctly in the styleguide since it is dependent on hard coded values and the height of the screen. The clearing works by adding an element that causes the log to become long enough so that the old content gets scrolled outside the area currently visible on the screen.

section.description: We use the gfx component is used for colorful "ascii art". Each line is 110 characters long. The line contents are aligned left when all of the characters fit on the screen. The line contents are centered on smaller screens where some of the characters won't fit on the screen. In the app we use javascript to snap the centering to the monospace character grid. Perhaps it is possible to make the snapping work with pure CSS some day. The first line in the example markup is an attempt to visualize safe areas for different breakpoints. The component supports 20 colors all thought the two blacks (0 and a) are perhaps not so useful since we would typically have a dark background.

section.description: The log component is used for vertical phrasing. It supports clearing the screen and adds empty lines to make reading the message flow easier. Clearing doesn't behave correctly in the styleguide since it is dependent on hard coded values and the height of the screen. The clearing works by adding an element that causes the log to become long enough so that the old content gets scrolled outside the area currently visible on the screen.
